items.title: Louisiana’s Declaration of Energy Independence
items.description: The new state law shifting focus to producing domestic fuel, not energy that relies on foreign countries, provides a model for other states to follow.

items.title: Pro-Lifers Aren’t the Crazed Haters Depicted by the Media
items.description: When the anger scatters, there’s real human concern and compassion.

items.title: When We Forget Our History, We Risk Our Future
items.description: In our highly partisan political moment, civics education is perhaps more important than ever.

items.title: An Epidemic of Media Doublespeak
items.description: And nowhere is the problem more severe than in the coverage of trans athletes.

items.title: The Legacy of Alasdair MacIntyre
items.description: What to make of the work and influence of the legendary philosopher and academic in the wake of his death at 96.
